data.title: Hï Ibiza voted best nightclub in the world for the 4th time in a row
data.meta_description: Once again, Hï Ibiza has just won the title of best nightclub in the world at the Golden Moon Awards. A 4th success in a row.
data.text:
Once again, Hï Ibiza has just won the title of best nightclub in the world at the Golden Moon Awards. A fourth consecutive accolade for this undisputed temple of Ibiza nights.

The Golden Moon Awards gala, honoring the best nightclubs, was held alongside the International Nightlife Congress. Once again, and for the 4th consecutive year, Hï Ibiza won the title of best nightclub in the world. Between the spectacular lighting of its Teatro and a line-up of the world’s most renowned DJs, the Playa d’en Bossa club has been taking party-goers on an immersive experience ever since it opened in 2017.

4 Ibiza nightclubs in the Top 10

Omnia Las Vegas and Ushuaïa Ibiza come in second and third respectively. The Top 5 is completed by the Bootshaus in Cologne and the Shôko Barcelona. In total, Ibiza counts 4 clubs in the Top 10, including Hï and Ushuaia, as well as DC-10 and Pacha. There are also a big names, such as Green Valley in Brazil, Opium in Barcelona and E11even in Miami.

This select list of the « 100 best clubs in the world » emerged after an intense competition involving 373 establishments from 65 different countries. Online public voting contributed 50% of the final result, while the remaining 50% was determined by a panel of experts assessing criteria such as music programming, safety, acoustics and quality of service. Some may find fault with this, but the fact remains : Ibiza is still the world’s party paradise !
